message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This report analyzes the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys data from 2013 to 2020, covering over 140 countries.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys data"], "topic": ["Competitiveness"]}, {"sentence": "We combined the Global Terrorism Database with the World Development Indicators to identify the socioeconomic determinants of terrorism in low- and middle-income countries.", "dataset": ["Global Terrorism Database", "World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Fragility, Conflict, and Violence"]}, {"sentence": "Our study compares data from the International Comparison Program with satellite data to generate subnational GDP estimates for Africa.", "dataset": ["International Comparison Program", "satellite data"], "topic": ["Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This analysis uses data on electricity generation from the US Energy Information Administration and climate projections from the Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 5 to estimate future water scarcity risks in Southeast Asia.", "dataset": ["US Energy Information Administration", "Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 5"], "topic": ["Water", "Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We draw on panel data from the Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture in Malawi to investigate factors affecting adoption of sustainable agriculture practices by smallholder farmers.", "dataset": ["Living Standards Measurement Study-Integrated Surveys on Agriculture in Malawi"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food"]}, {"sentence": "This paper combines the Survey on Health, Ageing and Retirement in Europe with national administrative data to analyze healthcare utilization by elderly Europeans.", "dataset": ["Survey on Health, Ageing and Retirement in Europe", "national administrative data"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "We use a combination of household survey and labor force survey data to analyze gender gaps in earnings and employment in Bangladesh.", "dataset": ["household survey", "labor force survey data"], "topic": ["Gender"]}, {"sentence": "This study employs data from the Global Burden of Disease study, together with World Bank and IMF data, to estimate the economic costs of non-communicable diseases in low- and middle-income countries.", "dataset": ["Global Burden of Disease study", "World Bank and IMF data"], "topic": ["Health", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "We use high-resolution satellite images and data on population and night-time lights from the Demographic and Health Surveys to estimate electrification rates in sub-Saharan Africa.", "dataset": ["high-resolution satellite images", "Demographic and Health Surveys"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "This research draws on three datasets: the Global Financial Inclusion Database, the World Governance Indicators and the Doing Business database, to assess the relationship between financial inclusion, governance and business climate.", "dataset": ["Global Financial Inclusion Database", "World Governance Indicators", "Doing Business database"], "topic": ["Financial Inclusion", "Governance"]}]
